annonstext:
Hi,

We are looking for IT Infrastructure  Experts level 4 Support to work on Australia /Newzealand Timezones   - Remote. 

Description :

Must be used to handle Cisco WLC, Prime, ISE, access points, Windows AD, DHCP, EAP-TLS, RF issues and similar.

Good if knowing IPSK portal function and how IPSK works together with ISE/WLC/clients.

Troubleshooting WiFi issues. ServiceNow is used for ITSM, in which the ticket's must be handled. 

Mandatory:

• Ability effectively communicate in English language verbally and in writing. Its a plus if candidate can communicate in Chinese and/or Korean.

* Excellent team player with a positive mind set

utbildningsniva.namn: Eftergymnasial utbildning två år eller längre
